name: Nike Air Max 90
description: The Nike Air Max 90 stays true to its OG roots with the iconic Waffle sole, stitched overlays and classic TPU accents. Fresh colors give a modern look while Max Air cushioning adds comfort to your journey.

name: Adidas Yeezy Boost 350
description: The Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 combines Kanye Westâ€™s signature design with Adidas' Boost technology for ultimate comfort and style. These sneakers offer a lightweight feel and a sleek look that turns heads.

name: Puma RS-X3 Puzzle
description: With its bold color-blocking and futuristic design, the Puma RS-X3 Puzzle brings the past into the future. This sneaker features enhanced cushioning for a more comfortable and stylish fit.

name: New Balance 997H
description: Inspired by the classic 997 design, the New Balance 997H features modern materials and a lightweight foam midsole for superior comfort. This sneaker is perfect for everyday wear and urban style.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star
description: A true classic, the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star has remained a staple of casual style for decades. Its iconic canvas upper and rubber sole make it a timeless choice for sneaker lovers.

name: Vans Old Skool
description: The Vans Old Skool is a symbol of skate culture and street style. With its durable suede and canvas upper and signature waffle outsole, it's a must-have for sneaker enthusiasts.

name: Reebok Club C 85
description: The Reebok Club C 85 brings vintage tennis court style into modern fashion. With a soft leather upper and comfortable EVA midsole, this sneaker delivers both style and support.

name: Asics Gel-Lyte III
description: The Asics Gel-Lyte III is known for its split-tongue design and exceptional comfort. This sneaker offers a perfect balance between retro style and cutting-edge performance.

name: Jordan 1 Retro High OG
description: A symbol of basketball history and street fashion, the Jordan 1 Retro High OG offers timeless design and premium materials. With Air-Sole cushioning, these sneakers are as comfortable as they are stylish.

name: Under Armour HOVR Phantom 2
description: The Under Armour HOVR Phantom 2 is designed for comfort and performance. With HOVR cushioning and a breathable knit upper, these sneakers provide a perfect fit for any activity.
